p: TTO minimal inhibitory/bactericidal concentrations (MIC/MBCs, respectively) were evaluated against a list of standard and clinical isolate strains of important microorganisms such as MSSA, E. coli, MRSA, ESBL-CS-Kp, CR-Ab, and CR-Pa. AMK, CFZ, MEM, OXA, COL, RIF and VAN were used as references drugs ( Table 2). As expected, CR strains exhibited high MEM MIC/MBC values whereas both MSSA and MRSA showed sensitivity to VAN and RIF.
